means: 现世主义者，世俗主义者

PerfectNetExp.abs: 现实中越来越多的人加入这一群体,’新无神论者’包容了更多的人,例如人道主义者(Humanitarian)、理性主义者(Rationalist)、世俗论者(Secularist)、不可知论者(Agnostic.
in some secularist accounts , he notes , religion is presented asodd , temporary delusion into which mankind was unfortunate enough to fall for a brief moment .他指出，某些世俗主义的叙述中，宗教只是以某种人类不幸短暂堕入的片刻错觉而出现。

list.abs: in Turkey , secularists are wrong to try to ban the Islamist-tinged ruling party , AKP ( see article ) .那些非暴力的伊斯兰分子，如埃及的穆斯林兄弟会，应当可以角逐自由选举。
secularist movements pushed for laws deviating from the opinions of the Islamic legal scholars .世俗化运动被推为法律偏离意见的伊斯兰法律学者。

entry.def: Secularism is a system of social organization and education where religion is not allowed to play a part in civil affairs.

means.word_mean: 1. an advocate of secularism; someone who believes that religion should be excluded from government and education

auth_sentence.content: It is solace for the dogmatic secularist.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is solace for the dogmatic secularist.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is solace for the dogmatic secularist.

auth_sentence.content: The big brother is a secularist and the younger is an Islamist.
auth_sentence.res_content: The big brother is a secularist and the younger is an Islamist.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The big brother is a secularist and the younger is an Islamist.

auth_sentence.content: Secularist groups are entirely opposed to discrimination against people because of their religious beliefs.
auth_sentence.res_content: Secularist groups are entirely opposed to discrimination against people because of their religious beliefs.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Secularist groups are entirely opposed to discrimination against people because of their religious beliefs.

sentences.cn: 现世主义者对科学事物的过分强调
